globalReach.description: Connect with buyers from around the world. Our platform facilitates international trade with tools designed for cross-border commerce.

easyToUse.description: Intuitive interface designed for both buyers and suppliers. List products, manage orders, and grow your business with ease.

advancedAnalytics.title: Advanced Analytics
advancedAnalytics.description: Track your performance with detailed analytics. Monitor views, inquiries, and sales to make data-driven business decisions.

secureTransactions.title: Secure Transactions
secureTransactions.description: Built with security in mind. Your data and transactions are protected with industry-standard encryption and security practices.

support247.title: 24/7 Support
support247.description: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to help you succeed. Get assistance whenever you need it.

aiFeatures.title: AI-Powered Features
aiFeatures.subtitle: We're building the future of B2B marketplaces with cutting-edge AI technology to make your trading experience smarter and more efficient.

productDescription.title: AI Product Description Generator
productDescription.description: Automatically generate compelling, SEO-optimized product descriptions that highlight key features and benefits.

autoTagging.title: AI Auto-Tagging & Categorization
autoTagging.description: Upload products and let AI automatically tag and categorize them for better discoverability and organization.

matchmaking.title: AI Buyer-Supplier Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Intelligent matching system that connects buyers with the most relevant suppliers based on requirements and preferences.

searchAssistant.title: AI Search Assistant
searchAssistant.description: Natural language search that understands context and intent, helping you find exactly what you're looking for.

trustScore.title: AI Trust & Verification Scores
trustScore.description: Advanced algorithms analyze supplier credibility, transaction history, and reviews to provide trust scores for informed decisions.

insightsDashboard.title: AI Insights Dashboard
insightsDashboard.description: Get actionable insights and recommendations powered by AI to optimize your listings, pricing, and business strategy.

about.title: About Pak-Exporters
about.description: Pakistan's First Export Marketplace - Connecting exporters with global buyers since 2019
about.whoWeAreDescription: Pak-Exporters is Pakistan's first and premier B2B export marketplace, connecting local exporters with global buyers since 2019. We facilitate international trade by providing a trusted platform for businesses to discover, connect, and trade export-quality products worldwide.
about.ourMissionDescription: To empower Pakistani businesses by providing them with the tools and platform needed to reach global markets, while ensuring quality, trust, and transparency in every transaction. We work together to promote Pakistan's export industry and connect premium suppliers with international buyers.
about.categoriesDescription: We offer a comprehensive range of export-quality products across multiple categories:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Fill out the form below
contact.getInTouchDescription: We'd love to hear from you

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Pak-Exporters
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Pak-Exporters B2B marketplace, membership tiers, product listings, and more.
faq.supportMessage: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

membership.title: Supplier Membership Tiers
membership.description: Learn about our supplier membership tiers: Platinum, Gold, and Silver. Understand the evaluation criteria and benefits of each tier.
membership.subtitle: Our membership tiers are designed to help buyers identify trusted suppliers while providing suppliers with tools to grow their business. Each tier represents a different level of verification, experience, and commitment to quality.
membership.evaluationDescription: Our evaluation criteria are inspired by industry leaders like Alibaba, TradeKey, and Pak-China. We assess suppliers based on business history, product quality, sales performance, customer satisfaction, and verification status. This multi-faceted approach ensures buyers can trust the suppliers they work with.
membership.howItWorksDescription: Understanding our tiered system and how suppliers can upgrade
membership.initialAssessmentDescription: All suppliers start with basic verification. Our team reviews business licenses, company information, and initial product listings to assign an appropriate tier.
membership.performanceMonitoringDescription: We continuously monitor supplier performance including response rates, order fulfillment, buyer feedback, and sales volume. Suppliers can upgrade to higher tiers by meeting the criteria.
membership.tierUpgradesDescription: Suppliers can apply for tier upgrades when they meet the minimum requirements. Our verification team conducts a comprehensive review including on-site inspections for Platinum tier applicants.
membership.benefitsForBuyersDescription: Higher-tier suppliers are more visible in search results and have proven track records. Buyers can filter products by supplier tier to find the most trusted suppliers for their needs.

starter.description: Perfect for new businesses starting their export journey
